revision.comment: Jkimblad moved page [[Sagemcom F@ST 2804 v5]] to [[Sagemcom F@ST 2804 V5]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sagemcom |model=F@ST 2804 |revision=V5 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63281 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL064PIF |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, J6 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43227 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=7C:03:4C |oui_eth=7C:03:4C }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N ADSL2+ Modem Router}}
[http://sagemcom.ru/item_61.htm Product page]
:8MB Flash, 64MB RAM
The default SSID pattern may be '''UTEL_HOME_XXXX'''.
